key.name: move-window-when-maximized
key.description: Automatically move maximized windows to empty workspaces. When enabled, both maximized and fullscreen windows will be moved. When disabled, only fullscreen windows will be moved.

key.name: trigger-on-maximize
key.description: When enabled, maximizing a window triggers ScreenToSpace workspace isolation.

key.name: trigger-on-fullscreen
key.description: When enabled, entering fullscreen triggers ScreenToSpace workspace isolation.

key.name: override-modifier
key.description: Hold this modifier while maximizing or fullscreening to bypass ScreenToSpace and use GNOME's default behavior.

key.name: triggers-migrated
key.description: Internal flag used to migrate legacy maximize/fullscreen behavior to the new trigger toggles.

key.name: insert-workspace-after-current
key.description: When enabled, ScreenToSpace inserts the target empty workspace immediately after the current workspace instead of using the last workspace. When the window is restored, it returns to its original workspace.

key.name: filter-mode
key.description: Controls whether the extension ignores apps in a blacklist or only manages apps in a whitelist. Use 'blacklist' to skip listed apps. Use 'whitelist' to manage only listed apps.

key.name: blacklist-apps
key.description: Desktop app IDs to ignore. When filter-mode is set to blacklist, windows from these apps will not be managed.

key.name: whitelist-apps
key.description: Desktop app IDs to manage. When filter-mode is set to whitelist, only windows from these apps will be managed.
